means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 威蒂绰号，机灵人，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“机灵的”(clever,ingenious)

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"使人高兴的，令人发笑的"之意。
means: humorous ： 指富有幽默感、诙谐、引人发笑的。
funny ： 非正式用词，通常侧重因古怪、奇特或不合适宜的举动等引起的发笑。
comic ： 指像喜剧一样滑稽可笑。
witty ： 强调机智而饶有风趣。

sentence.Network_en: He was witty, amusing and gifted with a sharp business brain.
sentence.Network_cn: 他机智诙谐，具有敏锐的商业头脑。

sentence.Network_en: He is a witty man, and an inspiration to all of us.
sentence.Network_cn: 他机智风趣，鼓舞激励着我们所有人。

sentence.Network_en: The book is witty and peppered with good one-liners.
sentence.Network_cn: 这本书诙谐幽默，妙语趣话随处可见。

entry.tran: 机智幽默的;妙趣横生的;诙谐的
entry.def: Someone or something that is witty is amusing in a clever way.

example.ex: His plays were very good, very witty...
example.tran: 他的剧作非常精彩，妙趣横生。

example.ex: He is a very witty speaker.

means.word_mean: 1. combining clever conception and facetious expression;

sentences.sentence: "his sermons were unpredictably witty and satirical as well as eloquent"

means.word_mean: <褒>机智的, 言辞巧妙的;情趣横生的

sentences.en: He made a very witty remark.
sentences.cn: 他说了一句十分机智的话。
